entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 8:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Periods of snow early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
